Subject: The Exciting World of Vegan Cheese Part II with Amy and Amy
Description: Join the Vegan Amys for another scrumptious vegan cheese adventure! We'll talk about all things vegan cheese: what it is, where to buy it, and of course what it tastes like with a smorgasbord of purchased and homemade cheeses. You'll learn about cool vegan cheese making techniques, including methods of culturing and aging. Plus we'll demo one of our own cheese recipes! Youll go home with plenty of recipes to make your own delicious plant-based cheeses at home  Speakers include:Amy Wright, Amy Wilkins - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour
